ygData.subject: Any Fletchers on Veeshan want to make some money....
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are on Veeshan and a fletcher, listen up, I ve got some money for you :) I m 30th lvl warrior and I m currently weilding a Shaped Oakwood Single Cam
ygData.messageBody:
If you are on Veeshan and a fletcher, listen up, I've got some money for you :)

I'm 30th lvl warrior and I'm currently weilding a Shaped Oakwood Single Cam Bow, but I'm needing a couple things

1) a better bow, prefereably a 2 cam bow
2) a good supply of good arrows. By good arrows I mean at least damage 2, range 50, I'll pay much better than the vendors do. I'll even buy multiple types of arrows as long as they are in quantities of 20.

I tried to take up fletching with another character, but I just don't have the time, so I'm willing to pay well for your time. You can reach me on this list, email me directly at coanj@..., or in game between about 7pm and 12 midnight CST.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan
